Summary: Was driving west toward town, object appeared approx 20 ft above car. Paced vehile for 4/5 minutes.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Rogers
There were no other sightings in Rogers on or around October 31st 1996
divs: sighting detailsi was driving toward home on state hwy 12. disc shaped object appeared about 20 ft above a street light. sunroof was open & object hovered over and paced car for approximately 4\5 minutes then sped off to the ne toward the rogers airport. it made no sound, but seemed to produce a powerful vibration. it was larger than the car, but smaller than a house. it seemed to follow the car and at one point was only about 6 ft above the car. it did not affect the car's performance.
